name: Too Fast For You! (UPDATE)
description:
The Game

This is a cartoon-like simple and fun racing game which is in its earliest stages. This is designed to be nice and light for any pc! This is the alpha of the game, I'm just wanting some feedback on it and how I could improve it.

If you do have feedback I'd love to hear it!

Please support this by sharing it to your friends!

Status

Since I'm developing this game on my spare time, the updates aren't that quickly published. But I try to update this game on every Sunday. You can see on what I'm working on here.

Stay up to date

I'm regularly posting updates on Twitter.

Come and join us on discord! Discord

Current Version - Alpha 0.4

-Alpha 0.4 Update-

Whats new -

- Added 3 levels.

- Added better settings for the game.

- Added Multiplayer (Coming Soon).

- Fixed the bug with the game not working.

- Fixed the bug with levels not displaying when you press play.
